channel.title: r on 我的測試區
channel.description: Recent content in r on 我的測試區

item.title: chunk output in Rmarkdown
item.description: 結論 不能 {{< notice tip >}} 只能 {{% notice tip %}}，就是說只能使用%❓。 tip 1 tip 2 和RMD檔案比較,沒差異 只是要注意資料夾必須小寫 相關的設定在theme.css note 1 note 2 note 1 note 2 note 1 note 2 摺疊輸出 hist(1:10) Click for Answer figure library(ggplot2) #> Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 4.0.5 oplot <- ggplot(Orange, aes(x = age, y = circumference, colour = Tree)) + geom_point() + geom_line() + guides(colour = FALSE) + theme_bw() #> Warning: `guides(<scale> = FALSE)` is deprecated.

item.title: global option in R
item.description: options 沒看到所謂的global option: blogdown.method options(); #> $add.smooth #> [1] TRUE #> #> $blogdown.hugo.version #> [1] "0.84.4" #> #> $blogdown.knit.on_save #> [1] TRUE #> #> $blogdown.method #> [1] "custom" #> #> $blogdown.serve_site.startup #> [1] FALSE #> #> $browserNLdisabled #> [1] FALSE #> #> $CBoundsCheck #> [1] FALSE #> #> $check.bounds #> [1] FALSE #> #> $citation.bibtex.max #> [1] 1 #> #> $continue #> [1] "+ " #> #> $contrasts #> unordered ordered #> "contr.
